item.title: Hello World
item.description: Dave’s back on his blog bullshit There is a login magazine-shaped hole in my heart. Having written the “monitoring” column for that magazine for a span of time so vast, that not only has the term “monitoring” become pass√©, but the very notion of a magazine about computer science has lost its place in the world, I find myself in the wake of login’s demise, feeling old lonely. Bereft not only of a therapudic outlet for my nagging inner-voice, but a cherished lens I relied upon to understand the world.
